text: @Laura_Ch We are here to serve you, we hope everything goes well, a hug.
PHOTO: Just after this morning's swearing-in ceremony. TeamJG http://t.co/1ja6bpIr
My agenda for the coming week can be viewed here: http://t.co/6i4woKXP # FH2012
Speaking at a rally to support presidential candidate Vladimir Putin at Manezh Square in Moscow http://t.co/a2vQLrQv
In the TGV, direction Nancy, for day on the theme of higher education and research. # FH2012 http://t.co/TQEy9zBx
I'll meet you from 6 pm at the #Nancy Exhibition Center for a big public meeting! # FH2012
I learn from the German press that there may be an alliance of conservative European leaders to not receive me.
I do not pay much attention because what matters is not the position of these leaders but that of the French people.
Here are my full responses to the press a few minutes ago, arriving at #Nancy: http://t.co/wGZYBCSO # FH2012
Visit of an innovating company: a company which deals with the trade of plants, with St Clément (Vosges). http://t.co/9N5EXxwQ
The meeting of researchers and industrialists in innovative companies should be facilitated: http://t.co/bCgTl8V6 # FH2012
start today at the Catshuis talks with @Maximeverhagen and @Geertwilderspvv about public finances. Photo: http://t.co/MFhaxS9s
Ziara ya kikazi Mkoa wa Kilimanjaro, Machi 2012. http://t.co/0Jt7nDYq
Dialogue with teachers and pupils of the VirtuREAL Pole, research and engineering center of Saint-Dié-des-Vosges. http://t.co/BWAihscg
I want to improve the means of guiding young people towards job-creating sectors. #Industry #Nancy Engineering #Nancy
We need to make a research effort and it is spread more widely. This is the challenge of innovation. # FH2012 #Nancy
We have at our disposal the "research tax credit". I want this one to be expanded. # FH2012 #Nancy
To develop technologies, we need the gathering of all: students, researchers and industry. #Nancy # FH2012
With the militants of Saint-Dié-des-Vosges. Let's stay the course, to win France! # FH2012 http://t.co/xNpAwvcK
We have a European future. I trust! # FH2012
My goal is to restore confidence to our country! # FH2012
Do not think that the right will leave us power without fighting! You must be at the rendezvous of the first round! # FH2012
It is not by discrediting others that one can rise oneself. # FH2012
It's been weeks, not to say months, that the right is trying to discredit, to denigrate. # FH2012
To this right I say: talk about your proposals, discuss your record, and defend your candidate, he needs it. # FH2012
And leave the other candidates alone! # FH2012
Meeting with the regional press at the headquarters of the Republican East in #Nancy. # FH2012 http://t.co/t7SPCNFX
I arrive at Biopôle #Nancy, hosted by the young doctoral students and researchers of the center. # FH2012 http://t.co/fFHIAJpc
A new inequality is born between the Universities, because of an autonomy of these poorly managed. #Nancy # FH2012
In 10 years, the OECD has downgraded France from 4th to 14th place for research spending. #Teaching #Nancy # FH2012
I propose the creation of a public service of guidance, unified from secondary to higher. #Nancy # FH2012
Each licensed student will need to know the business. #Nancy # FH2012
The first academic year will be reviewed because it is at its level that plays the majority of university dropouts. #Nancy # FH2012
I wish a national plan for student life: I propose the creation of 40 000 student housing in 5 years. #Nancy # FH2012
We will create a means-tested education allowance to build a path of autonomy. #Nancy # FH2012
This study allowance will be set up as part of a success contract, after an overhaul of the existing allocations.
I mean my confidence in the French University. I want to change it. #Nancy # FH2012
The doctorate must remain a national diploma. #Nancy # FH2012
I want to pay tribute to the researchers. I want to tell them our gratitude and encouragement. #Nancy # FH2012
I believe in scientific progress. There will be no human progress if there is no scientific progress. #Nancy # FH2012
The speech I made a few minutes ago on research and higher education: http: //t.co/tPBIz1X6 at #Nancy # FH2012
Meeting with students who organize tutoring at the Nations District, in the suburbs of #Nancy. http://t.co/x1yRkyub
The French expect a lot from us. The French want change! #Nancy # FH2012
I want to return the power to the French people! #Nancy # FH2012
I will not let myself be diverted from the path I have traced, that of victory, of change. #Nancy # FH2012
They are afraid of the verdict of the French people, hoping that the abstention will make the sanction less heavy. #Nancy # FH2012
We want the French to participate massively. #Nancy # FH2012
Nothing can stop us, nothing can stop us. #Nancy # FH2012
I do not want to distinguish between the French, the unemployed and the workers, the youngest and the oldest. #Nancy # FH2012
I want our people to be together in the recovery of France. #Nancy # FH2012
They will deploy all the state's means of money forces but you are stronger if you are determined to change #Nancy # FH2012
I owe you, this victory, you've been waiting for too long. #Nancy # FH2012
Find here the full speech I made tonight at #Nancy: http://t.co/JejsftnE # FH2012

Good morning to all, I share with you my agenda today http://t.co/F4jmuo1U
I thank @MartineAubry for bringing us together, Socialist parliamentarians, on this day of end of the term of office. # FH2012 http://t.co/5XIYnmgh
This rally of socialists, left-wing radicals, and Robert Hue's movement is a beautiful unity. # FH2012
I ask you to go door-to-door, to make meetings, to pick up voters where it is the most difficult! #AN # FH2012
We are a month and a half from the first round. Nothing is done, nothing is played. #AN # FH2012
If we put all our energy, our unity, and our will, I think that our victory is possible! #AN # FH2012
I want to meet you: register to come share a coffee with me on Monday, at the campaign headquarters! http://t.co/q5A2B5w3 # FH2012

@francklucas. Thank you..
The PM and @barryofarrell just announced Sydney will be home to the Clean Energy Finance Corporation http://t.co/V0ZIUk67 TeamJG
Return to Guatemala, after a successful discussion in #SICA, the Central American presidents agreed to discuss the issue of decriminalization

With a great exponent of football Emilio Butragueño who is part of the veterans of #RealMadrid http://t.co/PNEkxtjd
@elcuija the camisole that I hold in the photograph belongs to my son, because they gave us the whole family.
@ OcasrViellda If it is his, what happens is that they gave us a camisole to the whole family.
@GoDiegoRuiz Very good Diego, a hug cares.
@ansidida We have asked the MP and Mingob to carry out the corresponding investigations and the relatives to make the respective complaint.
@susanamorazan will be a pleasure as long as I can share my activities with you, a hug many blessings.
It is better to speak French for 2 good hours rather to talk about yourself for more than 3 hours! # Europe1 # FH2012
I believe that the head of state must regularly hold consultations with the opposition. This has not been done. # Europe1 # FH2012
5 years later, have the decisions been in keeping with the promises? It's up to the French to say it! # Europe1 # FH2012
The first measure I will take will concern me personally: to reduce by 30% the income of the President and that of the members of the government.
A campaign reveals a number of personalities. # Europe1 # FH2012
My first trip to Europe will be in Germany. I believe in the need for Franco-German friendship. # Europe1 # FH2012
Mrs Merkel will have to respect the vote of the French people. # Europe1 # FH2012
My favorite word? "Useful"! # Europe1 # FH2012
My favorite oath? I do not have a swear word, but expressions like: "make an account!" # Europe1 # FH2012
At the end of his term, N. Sarkozy discovers that large groups escape tax! # Europe1 # FH2012
I will set 3 rates on companies: 15% for small, 30% for medium and 35% for large companies. # Europe1 # FH2012
Good ideas, you must have them at the beginning of your term, not at the end! # Europe1 # FH2012
PHOTO: On the ground in Wagga Wagga this afternoon. TeamJG http://t.co/YGjuqXW3
The "75%" is not a tax but a marginal tax bracket on income over one million euros per year # Europe1 # FH2012
I know Football well. I wish Lyon to qualify against Nicosia! # Europe1 # FH2012
I wish clubs to invest, but I think there is moralisation to be done. #Football # Europe1 # FH2012
The people are the only ones who have the right to choose the system of government in Libya and not the category that is unique to this option.
In 2007, N. Sarkozy promised "chosen immigration". In fact, economic immigration has fallen to 10%. # Europe1 # FH2012
180,000 people come to our territory legally. # Europe1 # FH2012
Half are students. It is an asset for our country. I will abolish the circular Gueant. # Europe1 # FH2012
For those who have married a foreign spouse, what will we create as a family if we forbid regularization? # Europe1 # FH2012
There will be no fixed goal, but the need to have clear criteria. # Europe1 # FH2012
3 recognized criteria for all: work, presence on the territory, and the family criterion. # Europe1 # FH2012
If you meet these criteria, you are regularized. It's clear. There will be no complacency. # Europe1 # FH2012
Police, SES workers, ADF personnel, & many volunteers have helped Wagga Wagga & NSW during the floods. Thank you to all of them. JG
The Libyan people are the only ones who have the right to choose the form of their government. No group has the right to dectitate a form.
RT @SwannyDPM: Our economy is up by 7.4 per cent on pre-GFC levels - every other major advanced economy is lagging far behind http://t.c ...
@ anne_roumanoff said something very fair: polls do not make an election. Nothing is played. # Europe1 # FH2012
To be President, it should already have been? The argument of experience has no meaning in a democracy. # Europe1 # FH2012
I conform to what I am, I do not change, I do not need to change. # Europe1 # FH2012
I hope that the next government will be equal. # Europe1 # FH2012
I found that @LaurentFabius held its place well. He has shown that the outgoing president must be returned to his balance sheet. # Europe1 # FH2012
I am not in introspection or exhibition. My only goal is to serve France. # Europe1 # FH2012
We are not going to restore the business tax. # Europe1 # FH2012
I have never proposed to delete the family quotient. We will put a ceiling at 2000 euros instead of 2300 euros. # Europe1 # FH2012
Everyone will understand that the outgoing candidate wants to mobilize the voices of the extreme right for his own candidacy. # Europe1 # FH2012
An election is won in the first round. It is the dynamics of the first round that creates the victory. # Europe1 # FH2012
I met with the Polish Ambassador. He is very concerned about the desecration of the Polish WW2 graves in Benghazi. We condemn such acts.
Find the highlights of my speech this morning on # Europe1: http://t.co/lkD1GJuf # FH2012
I will be tonight the guest of the 20 hours newspaper of France 2! # FH2012
I remember the photographer Rémy Ochlik, who followed us in our travels for the presidential campaign.
Remy Ochlik had the courage to go to Syria at the risk of his life.
I bowed respectfully to the grief of the families who were struck because journalists did their duty to inform.
I asked @dombouissou, resp. from my press service, to represent me today at the tribute ceremony to Rémi Ochlik.
I ve just arrived in Kimberely at the house of Northern Cape Premier Hazel Jenkins to check how she's recovering after she fell ill
Congratulations on World Cup Gold Tora Berger!

From the outgoing president, I'm waiting for him to present his record rather than his apology. # JT20H # FH2012
The outgoing candidate has evaded a number of his responsibilities. # JT20H # FH2012
I can say no: no to crazy finance, no to indecent pay. # JT20H # FH2012
No to tax benefits that have benefited the highest patrimonies. # JT20H # FH2012
Republic, these are rules! # JT20H # FH2012
We must fight against illegal immigration. # JT20H # FH2012
It is necessary to go much faster on the answers to the right of asylum. # JT20H # FH2012
N. Sarkozy gave a false goal, which will never be achieved. #Immigration # JT20H # FH2012
The temptation of N. Sarkozy to make immigration a main theme of the campaign will not pass. # JT20H # FH2012
We will come back to the judicial map. # JT20H # FH2012
On Pôle emploi, it will be necessary to give means so that the pole can succeed its mission. # JT20H # FH2012
My first decision will be to withdraw our troops from Afghanistan before the end of 2012. # JT20H # FH2012
I will be elected not to settle accounts, but problems! # JT20H # FH2012
Football players, too, must have reason. # JT20H # FH2012
I would have taken note of Putin's election, not more. # JT20H # FH2012
On Syria, the actions that are carried out are in the direction that I wish, there will be continuity. # JT20H # FH2012
If I were not ready, I would not be in front of you to talk about France. # JT20H # FH2012
I am not a candidate to talk about myself, I am a candidate to talk about the French and their future. That's the difference # JT20H # FH2012
I am not in the exhibition. # JT20H # FH2012
I will be the head of a state, not a party. # JT20H # FH2012
Nothing is acquired, nothing is conquered. # JT20H # FH2012
I will make school my priority. # JT20H # FH2012
I just had a press conference on the announcement of Federation of Barqa. The Libyan government condemns any efforts to split the country.
@misrati_free yes we are aware of the problem. We are working on resolving this issue. The govrnnt is considering a major solution to this.
